entry.title: “Style”
entry.content:
Post 193267 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: The info about the two stories winning Pulitzers isn't accurate (it looks like one 2017 article did, among 20, but the 2019 one def did not win 2018 Pulitzer), and this bit seems sort of added on as a "gotcha" type thing. A post about this is fine, but let's not start off with misinfo messiness to get everyone riled. -- taz
entry.summary: Post 193267 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: The info about the two stories winning Pulitzers isn't accurate (it looks like one 2017 article did, among 20, but the 2019 one def did not win 2018 Pulitzer), and this bit seems sort of added on as a "gotcha" type thing. A post about this is fine, but let's not start off with misinfo messiness to get everyone riled. -- taz
